name: latest
description: Gets all the lates data for the selected coins like: price, supply, volume...
title: Latest Coin Data

name: supply
description: Gets the value for the current supply.
title: Supply value getter

name: coin
description: Gets the data for the specified coin, for the last 30 days.
title: Coin history

name: value
description: Gets the current value of the specified coin and its change for the past 24h.
title: Coin Change and Value

name: weekVal
description: Get the data of the specified coin, seven days ago.
title: Week value fetcher
